column3: News;Battambang: On the morning of January 9
column5: a man  discovered several unexploded ordnances.------Mam Phey
column7: from  Ratanak Mondul district was working on his land when he came across the explosives.------District police inspected the cache and handed over all of them to CMAC for destruction. ------https://k01.news/article/23976.html------Meanwhile
column9: a soldier was killed after a mine exploded as he was clearing land. ------https://www.postnews.com.kh/local/403161
